entity.name: Class_membership_criterion
entity.description: A Class_membership_criterion specifies a defined Class the object of interest may belong to.

entity.name: Compound_criteria
entity.description: A Compound_criterioa is an aggregation of multiple crterion instances through a logical operator. The aggregation operations of AND_structure and OR_structure may be nested.

entity.name: Condition
entity.description: A condition is a criterion and an information object which is used as the condition for evaluating the applicability of an object of interest in a context. The condition is identified through the identitiers of the parent document information object. The object of interest is identified through the document_assignment relationship inherited from document. The context of a condition is established when an information object acquires the condition. For example, a state may use a condition to define the state.

entity.name: Criterion
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(Class_membership_criterion, Compound_criteria, Date_time_criterion, Descritptive_criterion, Event_based_criterion, Numeric_value_citerion) ANDOR Condition, NOT_assertion )
entity.description: A criterion is an expression representing the semantics and structure of the parameters encapsulated by the expression.

entity.name: Date_time_criterion
entity.description: A Date_time_criterion is a Criterion specified by a specific Date, Date_time or Time_interval element together with the relative relationship to that element.

entity.name: Descritptive_criterion
entity.description: A Descriptive_criterion is a Criterion specified by a textual descriptive information. A Descriptive_criterion may represent a textual Attribute together with its value.

entity.name: Event_based_criterion
entity.description: An Event_based_criterion is a Criterion specified by a planned or unexpected event occuring to the object of interest. The criterion may only specify a situation or elapse time after the event happens. But the evlaution may return a value being TRUE or FALSE indicating whether the event did occur.

entity.name: NOT_assertion
entity.description: A NOT_assertion negates the parameter value or values encapsulated by the criterion.

entity.name: Numeric_value_citerion
entity.description: A Numeric_value_criterion specifies a numeric property value together with the appropriate unit of measure. The relationship to the value is indicated by the choice of a proper Comparison_expression subtype instance.
